About me

I am passionate about technology and web development, always looking for new challenges. I enjoy creating solutions that improve user experience and continuously learning to stay up to date with new trends.

I am fascinated by UI/UX design and creating intuitive and fast websites. I focus on writing clean and efficient code to provide innovative and high-performance solutions.

I want to continue evolving as a web developer, collaborating on projects that bring real impact. In the long term, I want to learn about mobile applications and emerging technologies.

Work Experience

TikTok Advertising

July 2023 - Nov 2023

Video Management

In my role as TikTok Advertising Manager, I managed advertising campaigns on TikTok, focusing on creating innovative ads and optimizing budgets to achieve positive ROI. I used data to adjust strategies and improve campaign performance, using advanced targeting and remarketing techniques to reach the target audience. Advanced targeting techniques were implemented, including the use of pixels and user behavior data to increase campaign accuracy.

Front-end Developer

July 2024 - Present

Sorcerer of Code

As a true code wizard, I use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to transform ideas into interactive, user-friendly websites. I focus on visual design and intuitive functionality, ensuring that every detail of your page is perfectly crafted.

Content Creator

Feb 2023 - March 2024

Instagram & Social Media

I created and distributed creative video content on TikTok and other platforms, adapting to current trends. I collaborated with 2 companies for sponsored campaigns and optimized the content based on performance analysis, increasing engagement and audience.
